bibl.title: State of Nebraska Department of Insurance Summary of Insurance Businesses in Nebraska

body.seg: State of Nebraska DEPARTMENT OF INSURANCE Summary of Insurance Business in Nebraska for the Year 1941 Also Comparative Figures of Authorized Companies for the Years 1938, 1939, 1940

To His Excellency, Governor Dwight Griswold: We respectfully submit the summary of business of companies auth - orized to write insurance in this State for the year ending December 31. 1941. DEPARTMENT OF INSURANCE, C. C. Fraizer, Director
